ModMetaData.name: Psy-Eltex
ModMetaData.author: XelNigma
ModMetaData.description:
I got tired of Eltex gear just wasting away in storage because its not worth wearing, not even between raids.
I also hate how my psychics have to spend half the day meditating to maintain focus. And seeing as Eltex is psychic gear, might as well kill two birds.
That this Mod does: Added Meditation Psyfocus Gain to Eltex Gear
Eltex Skullcap: 10% /day Eltex Helmet: 4% /day Eltex Shirt: 2% /day Eltex Vest: 4% /day Eltex Robe: 5% /day Eltex Staff: 12% /day
--------------
Now Patched to support Vanilla Psycasts Expanded
Added Meditation Psyfocus Gain to:
Eltex Mask: 2% /day Eltex Cape: 3% /day Eltex Dagger: 4% /day Eltex Mace: 4% /day Eltex Sword: 4% /day
